title: The Best All-Round Gaming Notebook of 2019?  Legion Y740 Review
description: The Lenovo Legion Y740 is a pretty compact 15" RTX gaming notebook but its also pretty affordable considering it has an RTX 2070 Max-Q and i7 CPU.  Not only that but with the 9th Gen Intel processors coming out soon, the sale prices are making the Y740 even less expensive.  But with high performance in our benchmarks are there any sacrifices like battery life, temperatures or noise?    Configure & buy the Y740 here:    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Cooler Master Q500L:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Lenovo. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #y740 #gamingnotebook #hardwarecanucks #le
